function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decentralized data pools at personal devices may lead to privacy concerns and unauthorized data access.","Impact":"Increased risk of data breaches and privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Implement strict access control measures and privacy-preserving solutions.","Technologies":"Blockchain for secure data storage and access control.","People":"End users, researchers, and data analysts.","Owner":"Research community and data governance authorities."},{"Description":"Low threshold healthcare IoT services may lead to inaccurate or unreliable medical data.","Impact":"Risk of misdiagnosis and incorrect treatment.","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous testing and validation processes for healthcare IoT devices and services.","Technologies":"5G for reliable data transmission and edge computing for real-time data processing.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and regulatory authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare technology developers and regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Energy requirements and computational efficiency challenges in healthcare sensors may lead to unreliable monitoring and testing/diagnosis.","Impact":"Risk of inadequate monitoring and diagnostic accuracy.","Mitigation":"Develop energy-efficient sensor technologies and algorithms for healthcare IoT devices.","Technologies":"Emerging technologies such as 5G and edge computing for efficient data transmission and processing.","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, and researchers.","Owner":"Healthcare technology developers and research institutions."}]}
